# Successful Applicants for the first Cohort of Arewa Data Science Fellowship

We are pleased to announce the successful applicants for the first cohort of Arewa Data Science Fellowship. 

These applicants have demonstrated a strong aptitude for data science, and we are confident that they will make a significant contribution to the program.

We look forward to the success of the program and to the contributions these applicants will make to scientific community. 

The full list of the successful applicants is [here](https://arewadatascience.github.io/fellows.html)

:::
